channel.title: Wtf error is stupid -.-

item.title: Wtf error is stupid -.-
item.dc:creator: @doomsword222 doomsword222
item.description:
@doomsword222 wrote:

Hello, can anyone tell me how I can fix this? First it said 2 errors, then 100 errors (-.-) I’m pretty sure it’s something with brackets though.

[code] if(command.startsWith(“banuser”))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 

  	if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tru3"))
{
	try{
	String otherPName = command.substring(10);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
	if(otherPIndex != -1) {
		client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		p.teleportToX = absX;
		p.teleportToY = absY;
		p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
		p.updateRequired = true;
	//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has

teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to

tele to you…");
}

}
}[/code]
